article_title: EDITORIAL: Don’t expect our next president to walk on water
article_text:
EDITORIAL: Don’t expect our next president to walk on water

Posted May 13, 2016 at 11:30 AM

Updated May 13, 2016 at 11:31 AM

article_metadata.description:
EDITOR’S NOTE: This guest editorial is by Dr. Mark L. Hopkins, who writes for GateHouse Media’s More Content Now.
Every four years, time seems to stop while we sift through a legion of candidates who might fit our vision for what a president of the United States of America should be. Considering the expectations we have for the holder of the highest office in the land, it would be swell if he/she could walk on water and leap tall buildings with a single bound.
We have to remember
